forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds this evening. Some decrease in clouds late. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds this evening. Some decrease in clouds late. Low near 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 4C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 41F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low near 0C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 33F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 32F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies with late-night snow showers. Low -1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of light rain and snow after midnight. Low 32F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A wintry mix, especially in the afternoon. High 1C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow and ice accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: A mixture of rain and snow showers. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low around 30F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. High near 0C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A light wintry mix of precipitation in the evening will become predominately light freezing rain overnight. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A light wintry mix of precipitation in the evening will become predominately light freezing rain overnight. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A wintry mix in the morning will transition to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow and ice accumulations of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain and freezing rain. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain tapering to showers. Areas of freezing rain early. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and freezing rain...becoming light overnight. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
